Class FileServer

java.lang.Object
  FileServer

public class FileServer
extends java.lang.Object

Simple file server that serves file partitions to the hash lookup workers

Author:
mdhasanimam

Method Detail

registerAsPrime

private static boolean registerAsPrime()
Attempts to register this server as the primary. If fails then adds a watch on the current primary. To be used within the watch handler and the main thread

Returns:
True if successful.
